parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the lightnings value smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero means there will be an immediate change.<br><br>
'''NOTE''': This command will have no effect (even though the value of [[lightnings]] changes) unless <tt>Manual Override</tt> option is selected in the editor in the Intel, which is normally off.<br><br>
[[Image:setLightnings.jpg|left|600px]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''setLightnings''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>1800 [[setLightnings]] 0.7;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lightnings]], [[overcast]], [[setWaves]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
